entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text:
@TMobile @Tesla Having a dependable car I would love to take it out on roadtrips. Grand Canyon, Camping. Thats what I would like to do. Right now however with Covid-19 Im blessed enough to still be working. So, for now, it would only take me from home to work and back
#TMobileTuesdays + #contest
